mapper.select: SELECT stud_no, user_no, stud_nm, scsbjt_cd, ps_no, stud_telno FROM student WHERE user_no = (SELECT uno FROM user WHERE uname = #{uname});
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pscounsel (stud_no, ps_class, ps_cn, psc_no, ps_hr, ps_ymd) VALUES (#{studentNumber}, #{value}, #{content}, #{psc_no}, #{time}, #{date});
mapper.select: SELECT psc_no, ps_no, psc_ymd, psc_hr, GET_CD_NM('CO0010', psc_hr) AS hr_nm FROM psschedule WHERE ps_no = #{ps_no};

SELECT psc_no, ps_no, psc_ymd, psc_hr, GET_CD_NM('CO0010', psc_hr) AS hr_nm FROM psschedule WHERE psc_ymd = #{selectedDate} AND psc_reserved = '0' AND ps_no = (SELECT ps_no FROM professor WHERE scsbjt_cd = (SELECT scsbjt_cd FROM student WHERE user_no = (SELECT uno FROM user WHERE uname = #{uname})));
mapper.update: UPDATE psschedule SET psc_reserved = '1' WHERE psc_ymd = #{date} AND psc_hr = #{time} AND psc_no = #{psc_no};
mapper.select: SELECT ps_no, user_no, ps_nm, scsbjt_cd, GET_CD_NM('U01', scsbjt_cd) AS scsbjt_nm FROM professor WHERE user_no = #{uno};
mapper.update: UPDATE pscounsel SET ps_status = ${status} WHERE pseq_no= #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT a.psc_no, a.ps_no, a.psc_ymd, a.psc_hr FROM psschedule a JOIN ps_user b ON a.ps_no = b.ps_no WHERE psc_ymd = #{selectedDate} AND uname = #{uname}
SELECT stud_nm, stud_no, uid, scsbjt_cd, GET_CD_NM('U01', scsbjt_cd) AS scsbjt_nm, uemail FROM stu_user WHERE scsbjt_cd = (SELECT scsbjt_cd FROM ps_user WHERE uno = #{uno})
SELECT count(*) FROM totalSchedule WHERE ymd = #{selectedDate} AND hr = #{selectedTime} AND stud_no = (SELECT stud_no FROM stu_user WHERE uno = #{uno})
